segments.description: Performs move of relation draft data to main persistent store during publication.
Removes relation draft data from the draft index (after successful publication).

[REGULAR].description: The point, performing refresh of caches and other temporary storage, for the record, being restored.

segments.description: Starts removal of record draft data (during draft removal upon user wish).
Finishes removal of record draft data (during draft removal upon user request).

[REGULAR].description: The point, performing refresh of caches and other temporary storage, for the record, being deleted.

This segment is a sample implementation of how a successful record event could be reported to audit or to any external consumer via messaging domain. It should be placed as late as possible in the pipeline in the regular segments section.

This segment is a sample implementation of how an unsuccessful record event could be reported to audit or to any external consumer via messaging domain. It should be placed in the fallback section in the pipeline.

segments.description: Starts removal of relation draft data (during draft removal upon user request).
Finishes removal of relation draft data (during draft removal upon user request).

[REGULAR].description: The point, performing refresh of caches and other temporary storage, for the record, being upserted.

This segment is a sample implementation of how a successful record event could be reported to audit or to any external consumer via messaging domain. It should be placed as late as possible in the pipeline in the regular segments section.

This segment is a sample implementation of how an unsuccessful record event could be reported to audit or to any external consumer via messaging domain. It should be placed in the fallback section in the pipeline.

segments.description: Indexes draft records data to a dedicated index for draft data. This point must reside AFTER the data processing point (org.unidata.mdm.data[RECORD_DRAFT_UPSERT_PROCESS]) in the pipeline.
Performs move of the draft data to main persistent store during publication.
Removes record draft data from the draft index (after successful publication).
Indexes draft relation data to a dedicated index for draft data. This point must reside AFTER the data processing point (org.unidata.mdm.data[RELATION_DRAFT_UPSERT_PROCESS]) in the pipeline.

pipelines.description: Default fixed reindex relations item pipeline.
Default fixed reindex records bulk pipeline.
Default fixed reindex records item pipeline.
Default fixed reindex relations bulk pipeline.
